title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Midik, gmanjaum * *.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Well, how'd we do it last time??

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Cartman just hit the button, and the ship flew itself.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Which button did you press, Cartman??

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: U-u-huh. I don't remember.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: You don't remember?!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: You dumbass, Cartman!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Hey, I was under duress! Maybe it waaas this one.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Soaring so high above the world.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Aawwww!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Never-

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The Missionaary 600, still pursuing the Marklar ship

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The ship seems to be made out of a... super-strong alloy. These lasers aren't powerful enough.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The 600 Club, Pat Robertson reporting

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Everyone, the the Word of God is going around the world and and all your help is so greatly appreciated. Eh-oo What we need now is an argon crystal laser. Eh you see, an argon crystal laser can pierce thick space holes in a way that other lasers just can't. Send your money now. Uuh-I th-thank you.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ethiopia, day. Feed The Chdilren Foundation. The agents are talking to Sally Struthers

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Onadonakami?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ms. Struthers, we understand that you have a ship of your own. One capable of interstellar travel.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Chewmbacca vije dai gwo.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: We need to use your ship to catch those boys. We will do anything for that technology.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Juodo nakahobi? Ho ho ho ho.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ms. Struthers, if those Ethiopians make it to another planet, who will send money to your foundation? Without Ethiopians, you have no food.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wo? Wo chaka gom??

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Oh, that won't be a problem, Ms. Struthers. We have... collateral.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: (Oh my God, I get it.)

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Oh ho ho ho ho ho ho.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The Missionaary 600, still pursuing the Marklar ship

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: I have the infidels in my sight.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Holy shit!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Whoa!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Doye dondabuh.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Aaah.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Holy crap, they have photon torpedoes.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The 600 Club, Pat Robertson reporting

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Uhnow, our deflector shields are useless against phorton torpedoes, and we really need your support on this one, folks. Here at the 600 Club we need your money to spread the Word of Jesus, and build more advanced deflector shields for our galactic cruiser. Call now, and we'll give you this free pin.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Space. The Missionaary 600 and the Marklar ship now do battle. Marvin fires at the Missionaary 600 twice more.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Aaah.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: You got 'em, Marvin.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Yeah, now finish 'em off!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Warning. Deflector shields failing.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Where did that come from??

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ho ho ho ho.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Good! Now get them in our tractor beam!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Now we've got 'em!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ho ho ho ho.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: It's Sally Struthers!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Well, it appears they'll be going back to Ethiopia, so we can go on to the aliens.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Sorry, Marvin. We tried.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wait. Ms. Struthers? Ms. Struthers!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wo?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ms. Struthers, please. Just listen to me for one second. You started the Feed the Children Foundation for wonderful reasons: to help starving, helpless people who live in a rotten part of the world. Well, it's for those reasons we wanna help our friend Marvin now.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Holna chewbacca?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ms. Struthers, don't forget the gift we gave you: the child in carbonite.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Dama doko nou na oh.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Ms. Struthers. You helped so many people, and you've taught us that helping people is what life is all about. All we wanna do is... be like you.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Oh, foada!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Whoa!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: She bought it.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Sally Struthers is saving us!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The 600 Club, Pat Robertson reporting

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Uh, now, now, stay with me on this one, folks. Uh, Sally Struthers has a Tiberian junker , which is uh the favorite ship of the Hutts, and she has trapped oureh, our our new CBC ship in a uh  poe-sitronic tractor beam.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
role: Uh, so we're gonna need an ionic tractor disruptor. Now now,
text: not a regular ionic di- tractor disruptor, but a negative ionic tractor disruptor to uh, help spread the Word of Jesus. [to Susan, softly] I don't have a fucking idea up here.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Space. The junker is busy pulling the Missionary 600 in. The Marklar ship is free to leave

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Now's our chance!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wait. I remember. It was the red button!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: They've opened the wormhole!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: It's pulling us in!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Aaaah!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Aaaah!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Marklar. The ship land. The Missionary 600 has to lean to one side. All parties are out of their ships

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Marvin...

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Please, please, please. We are confused. You must explain one at a Marklar.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Alien friend, we are here to spread the Word of Jesus. He died for your sins.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Who? Marklar?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: We brought Marvin and his people to live here, but these buttholes followed us.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Brought m- marklar??

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: What is "marklar"?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Yyou're marklar; everyone and everything is referred to as marklar.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Doesn't that get confusing?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Oh no. Watch this. Hey, Marklar!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Yes?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: You see?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wait. Wait. I think I can explain this whole thing. Marklar, these marklars want to change your marklar. They don't want Marklar or any of these marklars to live here because it's bad for their marklar. They use Marklar to try and force marklars to believe they're marklar. If you let them stay here, they will build marklars and marklars. They will take all your marklars and replace them with Marklar. These marklar have no good marklar to live on Marklar, so they must come here to Marklar. Please, let these marklars stay where they can grow and prosper without any marklars, marklars, eh or marklars.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Young marklar, your marklars are wise and true.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: What the hell did he say?

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wow! Good job, dude!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Thanks.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: The marklars can stay!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Wooo!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Alright!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Alright,

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: You marklars must leave.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: But you will all burn forever in eternal hellfire.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Yes, that's nice. Thank you for stopping by.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Well Marvin, it was sure cool seeing you again.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Chak chak glika gm gm guchab mglup.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: No, we gotta go. Sally Struthers is gonna give us a ride back to Earth.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Bwo chaaga bi.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Goodbye, Marvin.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Chak chak m geteaub m * *.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Maybe we'll come and visit sometime.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Yeah, and maybe Jesse Jackson will be President, heh.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: Dude!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: What? We're not gonna come visit him.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: I know, but you don't tell him that!

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: T'heh, whatever.

title: STARVIN  MARVIN IN SPACE
text: [End of Starvin' Marvin In Space
